sentences.en: But the KGB, in turn, was deceiving the Englishmen, because it really believed that they were playing a treble game and were all traitors to the Communist cause.
sentences.cn: 但是克格勃实际上以欺骗回报了英国人，因为他们认为，这几个人在玩三重游戏，实际上是共产主义事业的叛徒。

sentences.en: He has treble his income during the last few years.
sentences.cn: 在过去几年中他的收入已增加了两倍.

sentences.en: If you treble the distance, the gravitational attraction gets nine times weaker.
sentences.cn: 如将距离增大两倍, 则其万有引力就减小九分之八.

sentences.en: In management, as in music, there is a base clef as well as a treble.
sentences.cn: 管理就像乐曲, 有低音和高音.

sentences.en: James has a fine treble voice.
sentences.cn: 詹姆斯有一副悦耳的高音嗓子.

sentences.en: More than 7 million shares changed hands, treble the normal daily average.
sentences.cn: 有700多万股换手，是通常日平均成交量的3倍。

sentences.en: The form of consciousness is the system of treble structures.
sentences.cn: 意识的形式是由三重结构组成的系统.

sentences.en: They sold the house for treble the amount they paid for it.
sentences.cn: 他们以买进时三倍的价格卖掉了房子。

sentences.cn: 他们想今后几年内使哈珀 - 格兰特公司的营业额骤增两倍.

sentences.en: They will have to pay much more when rents treble in January.
sentences.cn: 一月份房租增加两倍时，他们将被迫多付不少钱。

sentences.cn: 曼联的三冠王当然是从曼城这里偷走的.

words.tran_cn: [数]三倍的；最高声部的；三层的；三重的

trans.tran_cn: 三倍的，三重的，高音的，最高声部的，尖锐刺耳的
trans.tran_en: a treble voice or instrument produces high notes
three times as big, as much, or as many as something else
to become three times as big in amount, size, or number, or to make something increase in this way
